description: Matthew Rush (in a non-sexual role) returns to his hotel for a good night's sleep, but Joe Foster has other plans.  He's been invited to an orgy featuring the sexual talents of Josh Weston, Jason Tyler, Brendan Falke, Joe Foster, Nino Bacci, Jack Ryan, Tommy Brandt, Cameron Fox, Derek Cameron, and Paul Johnson.  These randy studs help Joe out of his clothes and into their sultry team effort.  Gasps of pleasure and greedy demands fill the air as these erotic athletes stroke, fondle, suck and fuck...giving in to their urgent desires and immersing themselves in fulfillment.
title: Good As Gold, Scene #02
